name: Ronnie Goes to Hollywood
description:
You are Ronald Regan, the President of the USA and as well as trying to run the country and stay popular, you must complete a set of crazy situations and adventures. You start in bed where you notice a mine stuck to it. In the chaos to get away from the impending explosion you must find your trousers as well as getting the rest of your clothes on. Once dressed you can give a television presentation as the top floor blows off. This is the start of your wild adventures.

Ronnie Goes To Hollywood is a graphical text adventure where on screen you can read your surroundings as well as see them. You type in commands to complete your adventure.
